snippet: A report on the American economy added to investors’ upbeat mood following the broad agreement on the euro zone debt crisis, but uncertainty remained about Europe’s next steps.
lead_paragraph: A report on the American economy added to investors’ upbeat mood following the broad agreement on the euro zone debt crisis, but uncertainty remained about Europe’s next steps.

headline.main: In Rally Over Euro Deal, Relief Mixed With Wariness
headline.print_headline: Greek Debt Accord Rallies Stocks but Leaves Doubt
